column1: Little Goat Diner////The Los Drowned "sammich" was phenomenal.  The braised beef on a hoagie bun
column3: was outstanding and I'll be hard pressed not to order it again on my next visit.  A shared order of fries was equally delightful
column4: and the beer list was well appointed and had some favorites like "3 Floyds" as well as some lesser known options.  Good selection.
